_header: Saint Abdon and Saint Ceman tway brethren were
Subjects: Abdon and Ceman, saints, lives of; saints’ lives
_description: Lives of SS. Abdon and Ceman in the South English Legendary — couplets

Bod779.First Lines:
Seint abdon & seint ceman twey breþerin wereIn þe
                    lond of cordulis & weren kingus þere…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…þat we mote so libbe here in world þisseþat we
                    moot alle come in to heuen riche blisse
Bod779.Attributed Title: Seint abdon and ceint cemen twey holy Marteris (f. 239)
Bod779.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             “Des Ms. Bodl. 779 jüngere Zusatzlegenden zur südlichen
                Legendensammlung.”

                Literaturen
         82 (1889): 307-422: 416-19.
